Articles.Content:
Ok I have been looking around here and I neglected to post an intro.

Am am the owner of Elfnet Designs & Communications which is a real business that designs IT and communications infrastructure for business & law enforcement all the way down to a single home and hobbyists.

Our main focus is wireless data communications so if its a signal that needs to get from point "A" to point "B" we are the people who will do all the math and work to get you a proper system in place to reliably get your data stream wireless-ly to the intended destination whether its point to point or using communications satellites. hell for that matter we can designs birds for LEO or GEO sync or for things more close to home, your land based communications systems using radios and repeaters stations.

Now for KSP. Yes we are aware this is a game and its a quite fun game. So I will offer up our services in designing communications systems or constellations for those needing such things. Also we can build up the lifting muscle to get your birds into space in the game.

We are not rocket scientists by any means but we are communications and IT professionals.
